results.title: Report a missed bin collection | Introduction – Runnymede Borough ...
results.snippet: An online form to report a missed bin, order a replacement bin or start a new bin service.

results.title: Missed bin collections – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: If your general waste, recycling or garden waste bin has not been collected you can report it as missed after 4pm on collection day.

results.title: Why was my bin not collected? – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: Our bin collection crews report on their system the reason why they were unable to collect a bin. Listed below are the most common reasons why bins are missed.

results.title: Contact us about waste and recycling – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: Contact us about waste and recycling. How can we help? Report a missed bin collection. Report a missed garden waste collection. New or replacement bins ...

results.title: Report an issue – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: Report a range of issues online including fly-tipping, abandoned vehicles, street cleaning and missed bin collections.

results.title: Requests and reports – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: If your rubbish, recycling or garden waste collection has been missed check our service disruption page first before reporting a missed collection.

results.title: New or replacement bins – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: Lost or damaged garden waste bins will be replaced free of charge. If you believe your bin to be missing there are some things you need to do before reporting ...

results.title: Contact us – Runnymede Borough Council
results.snippet: ... report it and application form services. Report; Apply; Pay; Book. Missed bin · Fly-tipping · Street cleaning · Anti-social behaviour · Public bin issue ...

results.snippet: What is not a complaint? There are certain subject areas that we would not ... bin collections. ⭙offering a comment about a service. ⭙reporting a fault.

results.title: Garden waste collections – Runnymede Borough Council

selected_links.title: Missed bin collections – Runnymede Borough Council
strengths: Provides a dedicated page for reporting missed bin collections
Includes information on reporting the issue after 4pm on collection day
selected_links.reasoning: This link directly addresses the need for council customer information regarding missed bin collections and provides an online method for reporting such issues.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need it collected
Reason.answer_quality: The content partially answers this question as it provides instructions on how to report a missed bin collection.
Reason.reasoning: Although the information about reporting a missed bin collection is present, there's no clear guideline for next steps once the online form has been submitted or an estimated time frame for when the bin will be collected. However, the content does mention links to other waste-related pages which might offer additional details.
Reason.next_actions: I would submit a request for a missed bin collection using the provided online form and explore related pages on the Runnymede Council website for more information on potential timeframes or follow-up actions.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content is helpful in providing instructions on how to report a missed bin collection, but it could benefit from additional details such as estimated collections times and follow-up actions. My overall satisfaction level is moderate due to the information gaps.
